website_summaries.verdict: A low-priced cat tree with some known durability and design flaws.
pros: Easy to take apart and clean
Numerous surfaces for cats to explore
cons: Larger cats won't fit inside condo

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to the reviews before bought
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible cat tree. The only good thing about it is my cat seems to like this material over the carpet material. It is horribly laid out..my cats cannot get from one level to the next and it's pretty much impossible for my adult cat to get to the top bed. The bottom condo has absolutely no support it rocks back and forth and the only way to syabilize it was to put a block.of wood under it. The mouse came already broken so that was un use able. I have a kitten and adult cat and this is a horrible tree for either of them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lizarraga

customer_reviews.title: and a great deal. My cat does however have a hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge! and a great deal. My cat does however have a hard time getting to the top without jumping from the couch. I'm gonna build a spiral staircase, and secure the whole thing to the wall eventually. It wobbles when he's at the top. My cat also for some reason is very scared of the basket, but all cats are different, and if he were smaller he might feel more secure in it. He loves this tower and spends a lot of time in the bigger box.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: This is cool. I debated building one myself but for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is cool. I debated building one myself but for the price and the reviews, it cant be beat. That center portion is a bit wobbly,but I put a little block of wood under it and braced it against the shelf below and now no wobble. I also did what the others did in regards to switching the sleeping "cot" with the shelf. They can scramble up with no problem. Very good purchase here. One section of covering stared pulling away from use as expected with all furniture in the house, but a spot of glue fixed it right up.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Fine, with some modifications
customer_reviews.text: Attractive to look at, and easy to put together (despite minimalist instructions), but it's not well designed. The structure is wobbly, even when my smallest (9lb) cat is on it, and the top "condo" is difficult for cats to reach from the lower part or the floor. I would not recommend this because I don't think that my cats will actually use it in its original configuration. If you're willing to think outside the instructions, and make some modifications, the product is totally fine. I ended up nixing the pouch-bed, and replacing it with the platform from the small condo pillar. I put the small condo on the base, since it was way too wobbly on its pillar.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Sneeringer

customer_reviews.title: Very in-depth video review
customer_reviews.text: LOOK IN COMMENT BELOW FOR A LINK TO MY REVIEW VIDEO I took a short video when I first opened the box, but haven't uploaded that yet...it basically just shows how well it was packaged and shipped. This video is once I got it put together (under an hour later, with no help). In it, I show my cat's first encounter with the giant condo and I talk about the entire process the whole time I'm videotaping, including touching on a lot of the topics mentioned in other reviews here on the site. I highly recommend watching this video if you're thinking of buying it. Enjoy! LOOK IN COMMENT BELOW FOR A LINK TO MY REVIEW VIDEO
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: the bottom center post that holds up the lower cubby is not secure and wobbles. Kitty doesn't like that. We also could not attach the top middle post because the top of the upper cubby was not properly assembled and would fall over. If it were easy to return, I would have returned it - but how do you return something this large and heavy? Very poor craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.author: msayler

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend, returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this even with its mixed reviews. You get what you pay for. Packaging was damaged when we received it and the product was ruined too. We still gave it a try but ended up returning it. The instructions were easy to follow and in English, but the stance was unstable and unsafe. Very cheap particle board material. My cat is only 6lbs and almost flipped it. Also the product is much whiter than cream color.
customer_reviews.author: Dmguzman

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought it would be which is great. A little confusing to put together but easily figured out. Bottom most "house" is a little shaky and came off when our border collie bounced on it playing with a cat. We moved it to one of the shelves and screwed it down, problem solved. I suggest you secure this to the wall as you would a dresser in a child's room since an ungraceful large or fat cat will wobble the top a bit. Overall well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Nowaczyk

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect Cat Condo
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many cat condos and I'm very impressed with this one! It's sturdier than most and the quality seems slightly higher. It is a little difficult for my cats to get to the top but placing this next to something else they can jump on to get there solves the problem. Most condos this height are designed relatively the same so I'm familiar with that issue. I couldn't believe how fast the shipping was! I ordered this on Friday morning and got it Saturday afternoon!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Karkula

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to all cat owners
customer_reviews.text: One of the tallest cat trees available under $100 with multiple levels and perches. The color is a neutral one that blends with most pigments in the room. After assembling it, I feel that it should be anchored to the wall for more added protection. The only thing that I feel that it is missing, is a platform the cat can use to jump on to the main top level. It is hard to see in the pictures, but it is difficult for my cat to transition to the top most level with the platforms given. All in all, well worth the money. Would recommend to all cat owners.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W

customer_reviews.title: wish I had just bought one at the store ....
customer_reviews.text: The issue with this cat tree is that the kitties can't get to the top? I decided not to put in the hammock due to having a fat cat :) She was adopted as a fat cat. The 2nd issue I've had with this is that the top section will NOT screw in the way it is meant to so we have it firmly against the entertainment system so that it won't topple over! I would ask for a refund but it took me two hours to put it together .... :/ Hopefully, the cats will start using it or it is a complete waste of money and that is horrible on a tight budget.
customer_reviews.author: imadokichild

customer_reviews.title: Shaky and hard to navigate
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, and easy enough to set up. The issue is, however, that the unit itself is really unstable and moves around when my cat is just trying to walk on it. The worst part is, you can see how uneasy she is trying to navigate its small landings and ledges while keeping her balance on the shaky tree. The design is also a little too compact and could be harder for older cats to navigate to the top. Should have known something was up with the price only being $40. Would return it, but i would end up paying more to return it than if i keep it. Have to bite the bullet on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson Bumgardner

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Within a week the entire lower condo snapped off from the base. It is very difficult for the cats to get to the upper ledges. Switching the shelf and the hammock makes it somewhat easier, but not much. Very wobbly even though it was put together per instructions and I made sure everything was as tight as possible. Apparently not a good idea either since the lower post/condo snapped off from it wobbling when my cat jumped on it. I'm was then afraid to let him use it. I have disassembled it and just set the condos out for him to play in/on.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Collins

customer_reviews.title: A cat's perfect apartment. Hard to put together. Heavy box!
customer_reviews.text: Both cats want the top. No one wants the bottom. If you have multiple cats who both want to be queen, just get two less expensive ones. But then again, who knows what they'll do right? It's hard to put together, but it looks nice once it's up. It fits perfectly into a corner. I placed mine by the window. Top level near the window is THE place to be. Total VIP cat lounge. Mine trade off, and the bottom never gets used, but I feel good knowing they have an interesting thing to explore.
customer_reviews.author: Fairval

customer_reviews.title: OK, NOT BAD FOR THE PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: NOT BAD FOR THE PRICE. HAS ITS GOOD AND NOT SO GOOD POINTS. CATS LIKE IT BUT WISH THE BOTTOM ROUND CUBBY WAS BIGGER.WILL ONLY FIT A KITTEN OR YOUNGER CAT. THE TOP ONE IS BIG ENOUGH AND THE PERCHES ADEQUATE. BUT THE HANGING ROUND HAMMOCK IS ALSO TOO SMALL FOR A FULL GROWN CAT. I USE IT TO HOLD ALL THEIR BALLS AND TOYS.THE RUG IS SILKY BUT NOT VERY THICK. STILL OK THO. ITS STURDY ENOUGH AND THE ROPE COVERED POSTS MAKE IT EASY FOR CATS TO GRIP AND CLIMB. MY 8 YO STEPPED ON THE BOTTOM SHELF AND IT BROKE SO WE TOOK IT OFF. THE REST IS STILL LOOKING GOOD. I LIKE THE SOFT LIGHT COLOR.
customer_reviews.author: quest

customer_reviews.title: The other aspects of this tree are great. It's soft
customer_reviews.text: For the price the quality is superb, however, if you have a larger cat the bottom "birdhouse" thing and 2 platforms below it stands alone, so it wobbles, and ours broke out of the base so now the other cats have a harder time getting to the top of the tree. The other aspects of this tree are great. It's soft, fuzzy, durable, the rope is well secured, it's an overall great buy for the price. It lasted longer than the one I bought at petsmart, which my cats shredded the lower rope post on within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this kitty tower, I have had it over 2 years now and it is still in good shape. My cat has started to skin in but after 3 cats and 2 years I am extremely satisfied and am certain you will too. I is also extremely easy to assemble, disassemble and reassemble. I have moved 3 times since purchasing and it is very user friendly, and that is even with instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t take long to put together, but it is fairly wobbly. I’m thinking of ways to make it more stable, and my mom even wants to get rid of it. One of our cats sleeps in the upper condo and that’s it. My other cat won’t voluntarily go anywhere near this. I do regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bumblebee

customer_reviews.title: attractive and fits perfectly in any corner
customer_reviews.text: bought this one last year and like it very much! first cat tree i've ever owned. the main thing i like is the height, and also the fact that it's very attractive. i also like that the hut toward the top is plenty big for my maine coon. my only suggestion is to switch the location of the hammock: put the hammock below and to the right of the lowest hut, and relocate that shelf to where the hammock is meant to go. it makes it easier for the cats to get up and down.
customer_reviews.author: virginia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Build
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build and great for your cat/cats. My cat has explored and scent marked every inch of this thing. Now when we go next to it when he's on it he'll protect his personal space with slap to the passerby. If you really want to make this your cats favorite spot, then rub it down with a good amount of catnip right after you are done building it and watch your Kitty claim his purrsonal space. (Pun Definitely intended) Our Nibbler has never been happy since getting him this place to escape from hyperactive children.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Omerod

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble though the instructions were minimal
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old cat is totally uninterested and hasn't once tried to play in or on it. He might after getting used to it in the house. It was easy to assemble though the instructions were minimal. It is made in China and had a fairly strong chemical odor at first. I left the window open and it faded after a day or so. I don't know if it was the glue or materials used in its manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Roy

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it. We put their food on the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Owned it for 9 months. Cats love it. We put their food on the top two ledges so the dog can't eat it. As others said the bottom cave is wobbly. My cats don't seem to mind that and sleep in it anyway. The hammock is so small it is pretty useless. The kitties love to scratch and play with one another on the different levels. The toy mouse is a little creepy since they ripped the fur off but it is still attached to the string after some serious abuse.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best large cat tower - why?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cat tower and love it because my cats absolutely love it! The light color is pleasing, the 2 cat houses give cats a chance to hide or comfortably go and sleep. The top seats they love the height. I found the taller the tree the better they like it. They love to look out the window at birds and they can choose any level to continue to examine anything that moves outside the window. I highly recommend it. Only draw back - is it is hard to tighten up or isn't 100" shake free. I am picky and that is really picking, as it is sturdy, just I seek perfection. I would rate 98%.
customer_reviews.author: deborah brunhild

customer_reviews.title: We built it in one hour and the cats LOVE it. We exchanged the round bungalow with one ...
customer_reviews.text: It is superb if you have saved a nest of babies in the wild and have to take them in after their spaying from the barn.We built it in one hour and the cats LOVE it.We exchanged the round bungalow with one of the platforms on top, so ,that one can sleep upstairs and two others in the middle. It is a favorite place now that I have placed a birdfeeder outside their window.
customer_reviews.author: Uiltje

customer_reviews.title: Screaming raving lunatics
customer_reviews.text: This cat tree is much too flimsy. It would be fine for kittens, but it is not stable enough for really active cats weighing more than say 7 lbs. It took a long time to assemble, so we were screaming raving lunatics by the time it was put together. The diagram was confusing. The tree will go out on our porch once it is screened in and we can guy wire the post to something solid. I would NOT recommend this product, and it would be too expensive to return.
customer_reviews.author: LacelleTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Cost/Quality/Value... you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a very tall cat tree; this one is 80". I was also hoping to find something for less than $75 which isn't easy with tall cat trees. Yes, it is a little wobbly but it's solid. And my cat is smallish so there's no danger of her tipping it. Basically, I can't complain for a tree I spent less than $100 on with shipping. One thing, the construction of the platforms isn't such that the cat can hop platform to platform to get to the top. They aren't staggered. Also, the ledges are pretty narrow. My cat got used to it but she felt pretty unstable for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible product. Do NOT buy.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product zero stars, I would. DO NOT waste your time or money on this literal piece of garbage . Within two minutes of me putting it together, one of the posts broke in half, with my cat sitting on it, sending her to the ground (see before and after pictures). Luckily, she wasn't hurt. This is a prime example of the saying "you get what you pay for". I would rather spend the extra $100 on a real, sturdy cat tree. Oh, and if you want to return it as I do, they require you to take the whole thing apart and haul the 50 pound box to your local UPS Store. Absolute joke.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A.

customer_reviews.title: ... cat tree the screws got loose and they were amazing enough to ship us another one
customer_reviews.text: Our first cat tree the screws got loose and they were amazing enough to ship us another one, this is my cats favorite tree ever he loves it and it’s so long lasting now! Had it for 3 years still doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Penate

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this very tall scratching post because I just built a cat run, and the window (7 ft up from the ground) is where his cat door is. I needed to get something that could be a ladder to that cat door. I needed a tall one. Works perfectly. I read other reviews, and people don't seem to like the material it's made out of. Personally, I LOVE IT. It's like velvet. On MY instructions, there were no written instructions at all. Only diagrams. The diagrams were good tho. My friend put it together in about 1/2 hr. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chuckleby

customer_reviews.title: I was nervous at first..
customer_reviews.text: because all the other reviews are hit or miss but I loved this item! The bottom hidy hole is a little wobbly although the rest of the tree is great! I have 2 cats one much bigger than the other and they are always jumping all over it and it has managed to stay up! I was a little confused at first how to put it together but as soon as I figured it out it was so simple! Also the shipping was really fast, which was suprising for such a heavy item. I would reccommend this to anyone who wants to get a big cat tree for their cat(s)
customer_reviews.author: Becca R.

customer_reviews.title: Cats can't jump to the top because it overhangs.
customer_reviews.text: If built according to instructions, please note your cat can't jump his way up to the taller portions as the top portion hangs over the lower ones. This is made for small cats and should be set next to a desk or something so they can jump to the top parts if needed. Will try to rebuild and will re review if it works.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Strictly for small kittens, and very poor design, too vertical for easy climbing.
customer_reviews.text: Very tall but poorly designed, as cats must climb straight up....very difficult. Also the entire item is designed for kittens.....far too small for adult felines. Difficult to believe that the designer and builder had any real understanding of cats. A real Rip Off!
customer_reviews.author: L. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: its cute and easy to assemble my cat still prefers to sit in laundry baskets instead 💔
customer_reviews.author: Lillith Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I had to set this condo up and take it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to set this condo up and take it down immediately because of the major design flaw. There is no way for any cat, even the most agile one to get from the second or third platform to the top. Unless you have this leaning against a couch or table, your cat will be confused and angry. There are other condos for the same price. Whoever designed this doesn't understand the physics of jumping.
customer_reviews.author: Big A, Little A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Big cat tree that my cats use all the time. Not as sturdy as I'd like, but it's not that it would ever fall over or my cats would fall off. It's excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: This would have been a $200 + tower in the retail store.
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This is such a posh pad for the kitties! My kittens loved it and I was rather impressed with it myself. You'll have to assemble, but it's fairly easy to do. The material is durable. This would have been a $200 + tower in the retail store. This tower stands about 6' 5" tall and it has so many levels; you're going to need a whole corner of a large room or a small wall just for this unit. It's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: TiahsGrabBag

customer_reviews.title: Instantly loved by my little kitty!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I just received this and while putting it together my little kitty was already climbing up! It is great quality and easy to put together. She is currently curled up in the highest seat like a queen!!! I'm so happy to see her love it! get it because it's truly amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, we have only one kitten
customer_reviews.text: Item received quickly, however the packaging was insufficient, as one of the round perches arrived with a broken edge in the back support; the internal cardboard frame (within the faux fur) is bent fully inward and is inaccessible to reinforce. The unit itself is unsteady, especially the pole that supports the round condo; our kitty won't go near it. The top tier is more solid. Fortunately, we have only one kitten, and the tree is able to support her weight. She loves her cat tree, especially the top tier and large condo, the 3 perches, and the hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Base is too small. It's crooked. It sways when my two average-sized cats jump on and off of it. One year later the kitty condo at the bottom has come loose and the sisal rope on the posts is torn to shreds. Yet, after a year, I'm ready to purchase the exact same one. Why? Because my ADORE the damn thing. I do wish they had a color other than white, it's been difficult to keep it clean. Despite my criticism, my cats would give this 5 stars if they could. I'm not even considering any other cat tree. And at $80, including shipping...easy assembly...what have you got to lose?
customer_reviews.author: Tobi Brock

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and my kitten does too
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and my kitten does too, the only reason I am giving this 4 stars and not 5 is because the structure is wobbly, so it needs to be placed in a corner but once it's there it is stable enough for her to go all the way to the top without much trouble. How ever my older larger cat was not able to make it to the top as the structure was to wobbly and was hard for him to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: myopinion

customer_reviews.title: Rent Stablized Kitty Condo
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's easy to put together. It's stable, although to be honest I have a 25 lb weight holding the base down just to prevent a Cat-astrophe. My cats love it. My little kitten crawls into the basket and sleeps the day away and my other older cat curls up inside on of the rooms. It's really affordable compared to the junk they have at other retail locations. I'm really glad we bought this cat condo. It's perrrfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnoed

customer_reviews.title: 80" "The Tabby" Cat NapTM Cat Tree Condo Pet Furniture Scratching Post
customer_reviews.text: Carpet cover all the under-material and is nice in appearance. The instructions and fitment were a snap. Really good adjoining male/female threads but, the sections that are only supported at one point are flimsy (lower hideout waivers in the air - top heavy) and some of the rungs are directly underneath other rungs, with no offset to them so the animals can't/problably won't jump to each (like the one directly under the large hideout platform). The hammock is on the slightly small side. Little too busy at the botom. Generally a nice looking product with some seemingly impractical features.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: Any others this size that I've looked at were way over $100, yes, the shipping was about $34, but it is heavy. The cats (we have 4) were trying to play in and with it while we were setting it up. The instructions for it were pretty vague, so I pulled up the picture to go by, too...total set up time was probably 20 minutes. Other then improving on the instructions, for $34.95 (plus, of course, the shipping) it was a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Sue K

customer_reviews.title: Directions terrible, product great.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars because my cat loves it, but the directions to put it together are terrible. None of the parts are labeled and I had to remove pieces after assembly several times to move them to the proper position. Once you get it together, it's solid and cats love it. Price was good, too, in comparison to pet stores. Worth the hassle of assembly if you like your cat.
customer_reviews.author: PapaJ

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not suitable for large cats
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats...They aren't petite. They are both indoor kitties and need to climb. We thought that they would like the hammock but they are both too big and they didn't seem very interested in it, we put their toys in there and that works nicely. They haven't used the top perches like they did with our previous cat tree. Our larger cat really enjoys the top condo. It's not very stable and we need to anchor it to the wall. We don't regret the purchase but would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: M.M

customer_reviews.title: Ordered white, got cream, but keeping!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We had to modify it like many others have, but overall it's a great buy for the price, I've seen cat trees way smaller at petsmart for 100 bucks and more. It's a great corner purch, it's so tall, East to put together. They already love it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this pet tower!!
customer_reviews.text: More importantly, my cats love it! I call it their Ivory Tower! I still can't believe that I was able to get this great Cat "furniture" at the price I paid. I have a small apt., and thought where will I ever put it, but it has a place it fits perfect, and the cats, I have 2, just love to play and sleep on it!
customer_reviews.author: Cloud  Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design for a pretty much unusable cat tree!
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY disappointed in this cat tree. It is designed VERY poorly. It is quite wobbly & rickety to begin with, but to make it worse, the platforms are so poorly designed that my three cats cannot even jump up on them to get to the higher platforms. I feel like I totally wasted my money on this!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Dechenne

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, terrible company
customer_reviews.text: Mine came mostly broken. the 2 large pieces that holds the majority of it together we broke. took over 3 months of lies and broken promises from the company stating the replacement parts were on the way. finally got them to just refund the money. still out 80 bucks from shipping company i have to use since they will not mail it directly to an APO. Curse of being military but the price would have still been worth it given the product actually arrive intact and with all the proper hardware. Great if it makes in 1 piece. good luck if it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love This Cat Condo!!!
customer_reviews.text: We reconfigured the assembly a little as the top level was above the top of the window where we wanted it so our cat could see the birds & squirrels. Puff LOVES it! She spends time during the day on it and sleeps on the top perch at night. She utilizes the scratching posts now instead of our leather couch😄! Very pleased with quality and rapid delivery. Impressive size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great tree-kind of small for adult cats
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric covering this tree. MUCH better than the last tree I had. It's nice and soft and smooth. However, once it was together, it was hard to see how my 3 adult cats would sleep comfortably in the top three perches. They are pretty small for an average adult cat and my cats like to be as high as possible. So far, they have been doing their "sleeping" on top of the upper house, instead of the perches.
customer_reviews.author: A. Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: The tabby cat tower
customer_reviews.text: It's working! The Kittens use it! The mouse is already torn off but, they still play with that mouse. It's a work in progress im sure when they are older thats a good place for them to chill. It was easy to put together. Oh, yes, they have not yet scratched any posts! I'm trying to find something for them to scratch on that is the only thing I'm questioning?
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mainly so the cats would leave my furniture alone. It has worked for the most part, except they seem to love my expensive recliner. They don't touch the couch and loveseat, and they do love to climb and lay on top looking out over their domain. I have dogs and I feed them on this as well so the dogs would leave their food alone. They love it for many reasons.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Movin on up!
customer_reviews.text: It took my cats a week to explore...but now it's claimed! All 3 have a place to go. No more sharing (squeezing) like they're still kittens!! (Although I enjoyed watching them try, lol) Sturdy, I have mine in a corner. Easy to vacuum. It's a softer carpet, not the tradition looped kind that is impossible to vacuum at times.
customer_reviews.author: dvswlf

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good cat tree.
customer_reviews.text: Great cat tree, our cats really love it. The only issue is the ledges are a little small (we have very big cats), and the bottom hut is meant for tiny cats (my adult males can't fit in it), and it is pretty unstable and wobbles when a cat is on top of the hut. Overall good tree though, better for smaller cats.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love this Tree!
customer_reviews.text: I am more than happy with this cat tree it is so gorgeous and was easy to put together. I may end up getting some tools to make it more sturdy but it’s totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New 80" "The Tabby" Cat NapTM Cat Tree Condo Pet Furniture Scratching...
customer_reviews.text: great price and just like all the ones in the pet shops, but a way better price...i looked these up in just retail stores and for the 80" you would pay anywhere from $150-$200; plus delivery. i bought this for $105 with tax and delivery... it is huge and the color of the carpet is very soft and alot brighter in person....delivery was pretty quick and wasn't too hard to assemble....
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Cats LOVED this!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was by far a GREAT value! The cat condo arrived promptly and was easy to assemble (although the box it arrived in was beat up realllly bad.) Our two kittens LOVE it!! The ONLY reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because of the smell of the item. I'm not sure if it's the material or maybe the glue, but the smell is really bad. I sprayed Fabreeze on it and now it smells of that weird odor with a light Fabreeze scent. Hopefully over time, that nasty smell will go away. Other than that, this was 100% worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great product but...........
customer_reviews.text: We have had this cat condo now for 7 months now and it is starting to fall apart. I had to remove the bottom kitty house because it was breaking. There are numerous spots where the fabric is wearing away due to the fact that they used really cheap fabric on the condo. This condo is very cheaply made and is definetly not worth the money that it costs. If you are handy you can easily make one for a third of the cost. The only saving grace is that my cat uses this to scratch and not any of my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Rex and Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Caturday Night Live
customer_reviews.text: My cats are spoiled little a holes. This thing is easily worth 3 times the price though. Solid, sturdy, and massive. My cats could host a sweet high rise party in this bad boy. Except the fat one, he can't get to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Keener

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the tree but disappointed after I received it. Easy to assemble but not sturdy. Had to put a piece of rope around one area and nail it to the wall. No I would not recommend to anyone. I wasted my money Used for one cat of 12 lbs. very unsatisfactory product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've had this piece for 5 years now. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this piece for 5 years now. It was worth every penny. It has only sustained minimal damage... most by my dog when we 1st got it... he exceded the weight limit on a lower tier while trying to get a look inside the cubbies
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Sasin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME cat house
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME cat house. My only recommendation is to use brads to reinforce each of the upright tubes. We did eight on each end, and can guarantee if you use this little trick (takes about an extra half an hour to assemble) this cat house will be a pleasure to own for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Economical activity tree.
customer_reviews.text: Large cat activity tree for a great price! Very sturdy. Simple instructions. Well labeled pieces. Easy to put together. No weird chemical smells. Color in pic is true. Lots of wrapped sisal to scratch. My one minor complaint: it's not made of white carpet but rather soft Minkee fabric which thankfully my cat likes but I was expecting carpet. I worry the fabric will wear out more quickly over time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My cat likes this.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together, didn't take nearly as long as I expected looking at all the pieces, and once my cat got used to seeing it, and felt confident about climbing on it, he loved it. He likes getting up on high things, so this is ideal for him to climb on and into. And he enjoys batting the hanging ornament on the elastic string while he's on the flat shelf. Glad I got it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Guvnah

customer_reviews.title: Good product, weird placement
customer_reviews.text: It's a good cat tree. Sturdy. the only problem I have is the way the instructions have to assemble it, there is no way for older, less agile cats to climb to the top. We had to rearrange some pieces so there was a ledge leading to the top house.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: very nice piece for you cats to play on...assembley wasnt a problem but i did do a little modification in order for it to be stable,nothing major,just a few extra screws to sturdy it up...its a great value considering the size of it...very soft and plenty of room on it for multiple cats to enjoy....i believe it to be worth the money,just prepare to pay considerable amount for shipping....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: You can rearrange a bunch of different ways. When placed in a corner for added stabilization, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Janzekovich

customer_reviews.title: It's not very safe
customer_reviews.text: You gotta make your own reinforcements so it doesn't wobble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat tree
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is an indoor cat and loves to climb. We already had one smaller cat tree so we purchased this second one for the corner. We put a bridge linking the two so she get more exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Cahill

customer_reviews.title: The cat tree itself is fine, but my kitten almost killed herself by strangulation
customer_reviews.text: The cat tree itself is fine, but my kitten almost killed herself by strangulation. The included toy is on the wrong spot and the string will wrap around their neck and kill them. Luckily my husband saw it and saved the cat. A lawsuit waiting to happen!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H

customer_reviews.title: ALRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I got this recently and I was kind of disappointed honestly so the poles don't look nothing like the picture I got all carpeted ones and some that's full scratchers which looks odd put together but hey my kitten needs a tower so what the heck ! I can deal with it and very true that the tower is a bit wobbly with my kitten so I can imagine when she gets older and heavier but overall it's alright I can feel the material is fragile and if your cat is super rough it might be destroyed sooner than you think. Can't lie though it's good enough to keep your kitten occupied and climb very high.
customer_reviews.author: Nubia

customer_reviews.title: It holds up great and I have changed the design to better serve ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews mention a cheap design and build. It holds up great and I have changed the design to better serve my lazy cats but it is well worth the price. I'm thinking of ordering another to further expand the design.
customer_reviews.author: BvC

customer_reviews.title: I especially love the height and the many compartments for him & ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves his condo. I especially love the height and the many compartments for him & her (Patches hasn't warmed up to it yet) to co-exist comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: bigger isn't always better. This cat condo may be tall
customer_reviews.text: bigger isn't always better. This cat condo may be tall, but many of the shelves are small and not suitable for larger cats. Also the hight of this condo makes it wobbly as the cats are going up to their favorite condo hole (the upper larger one). The cats do like to scratch on the rope tied around the pole. If I had to do it over again, I would not buy one that is so huge!
customer_reviews.author: MKZ

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible design. There is no way for a cat ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! This is a terrible design. There is no way for a cat to jump from a lower shelf to the top shelf. The top shelf sticks out farther than the lower shelves. And the 3 highest platforms are too small for an adult cat to lie on.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Carey - Home

customer_reviews.title: cheap!! (quality), the pics are not what ...
customer_reviews.text: cheap!! (quality), the pics are not what you think...the housing isn't formed out of cardboard or wood and then covered....it is a casing.....it doesn't fit properly...you have to staple it to the frame. I would NOT buy this product again......you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Big, affordable, but very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: nice sized cat tree. Very cheaply made. The platforms might fit kittens, but that's it. My big cats still like it.....but it cant even come close to the 2 armakat trees I have.
customer_reviews.author: geokon

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this but it is falling apart. We had great customer service and they replaced some of the pieces but before we could get those replacement parts, other were falling apart also. Where the screws go in break making the scratcher very wobbly and the fabric is coming down from the tops of the poles. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good value, bottom cubby is a lil wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Good value, bottom cubby is a lil wobbly, materials are on par for price. Do not expect anything amazing but you are getting a decent value for the price. I have 4 cats between 15-19 pounds(muscular) and they enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Vexatious

customer_reviews.title: Good price but not enough platforms to help your cat ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price but not enough platforms to help your cat get up and down from. Over all its easy to put together, that was nice. The top level platforms are definitely too small for even a normal size cat. I wouldn't buy it again but it's also not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lefebvre

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for assembly could've been better and once put together correctly and tightly, it still wobbles a bit, but it IS over 6 feet tall and my 3 cats love it! They weigh from 6 pounds to 10 pounds and it holds them fine. Yes, they tore the mouse off in a matter of minutes, but I just tied it back on tight by the tail and it's fine. You absolutely can't beat this for the price!!! Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, should have gone with gopetclub again.
customer_reviews.text: The rope around the polls is very poorly secured down, the smaller house on the bottom is very wobbly, the carpet is very very thin and unfinished, and the top cat beds are not as depicted.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Wroblewski

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 young cats and as soon as we got it put together, they were all over it! The tallest perch is close to the ceiling, so they enjoy looking down on everything. All the posts are wrapped in a rope that makes it a great scratching post and great for climbing. My youngest kitten is almost 5 months and she can climb from the base to the top in less than 2 seconds! We jokingly call her spider kitty lol.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Leigh Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend with two cats who are indoor only. The cats adore this tree and have been jumping and sleeping all over it ever since it was put together! Easy to assemble, adorable and big enough for his rather tubby cat. He loves it! He might put images of them on his site bravecape.com bravecape productions
customer_reviews.author: Calle

customer_reviews.title: New 80" "The Tabby" Cat NapTM Cat Tree Condo Pet Furniture Scratching Post...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it and it looks nice in my living room! I used the pictures to put it together. I'm handicapped, so I placed the parts around me on the couch and just sat there and put it together in front of me until I had to stand up to reach the rest of it. It didn't take me long at all.
customer_reviews.author: sandywitch

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and Platforms/Hammock too small
customer_reviews.text: This whole thing is terrible. We got this for our cat who just turned 1, he's 10lbs and he is too big for this thing. Not to mention it's too tall and the base is too small, so it falls when the cat jumps on it. Partly because the whole thing wobbles. Those platforms aren't even big enough to stand on let alone lay on an enjoy. Read the dimensions, and look at a ruler at the same time and think about your cat. We tried to return this except it would have been $80 for shipping, money that wouldn't be returned since we only spent $30 to get shipped to us. Entire waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: amylfed

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to entertain our two new cats and they love it. The high platforms are perfect to retreat to for cats trying to escape from a toddler! If you can't find the cats, odds are they are curled up on their 'cat tree'. Not too difficult to assemble either.
customer_reviews.author: Rk

customer_reviews.title: good for kittens but if they are over a yr ...
customer_reviews.text: smaller than I thought, cats have a hard time laying in the small beds. good for kittens but if they are over a yr old very hard for them to use. They do love the house since there is room and solid where the posts are too thin and not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Stiles

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: For the price I should have expected what I got. The fabric is soft and not what real cat towers are made of. Which is usually carpet. The twine is a good thing!
customer_reviews.author: denice

customer_reviews.title: My cat can't really stick her claws in it and doesn't like it as much as a carpet
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was more carpet. My cat can't really stick her claws in it and doesn't like it as much as a carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Vinovine

customer_reviews.title: I am not kidding- this product is almost UNUSABLE by ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not kidding- this product is almost UNUSABLE by my cat. The bottom little hut is only sitting on one frail stick. If she jumps on the bottom platform the entire hut shakes. I would imagine it's going to snap any day now... Also there is NO way for cats to get to the top hut without vertically doing a pull up to it. That said, she can't even get back down the way this thing was originally built!! I actually rearranged the parts so there is a platform she can reach coming down from the top! I would return this if it wasn't a huge pain. NOT worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jensen Hussey

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it :)
customer_reviews.text: My cats love their new home. It was easy to install. The instructions are pretty clear. It's high enough that my cat can touch the ceiling which she likes. It's a velvet like fabric all over he tree. It's pretty stable when my cats are climbing and getting off.
customer_reviews.author: AllyMo

customer_reviews.title: worst crap ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst crap i ever bought. My cats hated it. I wrote to the company, told them it was pourly. Made. I wanted my money back and shipping. The next day had a refund of both and was told to donate the cat condo or throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Bianco

customer_reviews.title: Junky
customer_reviews.text: This is very junky and wobbly, no amount of tightening seems to make it sturdier. We tried very carefully to move it and one of the pieces broke off. Another one we couldn't get to stay on very well, then it wobbled, fell off and broke. The cats love it but if I had it to do over I'd have gotten a nicer more expensive one at the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble and was packaged in an easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Cat absolutely loves it. Easy to Assemble and was packaged in an easy to follow manner. The box kept the cat busy while it was being assembled so it was a 2 for 1 product! Win!
customer_reviews.author: Daharry121314

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: shipping could of been cheeper but the product itself was good the only problem i am having with it is the round cat tree is wobbley as hell i had to fabricate two blocks of wood and attach them under the lower triangle to stablaize the center cat house.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: spoiled cats
customer_reviews.text: Got this cause my cats kept on jumping on my monitor. The material is not 100% premium but it works fine for what I need it for. The tree feels kind of wobbly but the cats jump up and down on it and does not budge. I rearranged the tree from what the directions cause it is such a customizable tree. Might buy another one of these to make an even larger tree.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Perez

customer_reviews.title: For smaller cats
customer_reviews.text: The perches are a little bit close together. Fine for small cats but not larger ones - the big kitties have a hard time navigating around on this. Little kitty loves the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Renee M Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, minor problems
customer_reviews.text: Delivery charge was very expensive, but most cat trees would cost 100+ dollars at a store and the tree was cheaper including shipping costs. Good: It was easy to put together and the cats really enjoy spending time on it. It has reduced scratching on other furniture in my house, too. Bad: It does shake a little and my cats don't weigh that much. Also, my cats are not the best jumpers and they really struggled to get to the top. I had to rearrange the structure and that doesn't help with the shaking problem.
customer_reviews.author: Shahna

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 80in Pet Condo Furniture Kitten Cat Tree Scratching Post House - Beige
product_meta.description: This 6ft condo gives your cat 6 different levels to scratch, play, and sleep in. It features two condo bedrooms, flat platforms and nine scratching posts. FEATURES: Beige Color; includes hanging rope and toys; Material: Faux Fur, compressed wood Posts & Natural Sisal Rope for the scratching posts; Top (2) round perch sizes: 11" Diameter; Fan shaped top perch size: 13 1/2" Length; Big Condo Size:17" (L) X 24" (W) X 12" (H); Small condo size:13" Diameter X 12" (H); Hammock size: 12" (L) X 12.5" (W); Base board size:23" (L) X 39" (W); Overall size: 28" (L) X 38" (W) X 80" (H).
feature_bullets: Cats will have a blast, as this versatile tree stands more than 6 feet tall for your furry friend to climb, scratch, play, and sleep on 6 different levels
Features 2 enclosed condo bedrooms that can accommodate cats of different sizes or simply provide added luxury when they want to switch it up
The perfect structure for playing and lounging, crafted with 9 scratching posts and multiple flat platforms
Built with a cat hammock and hanging toy mouse, this cat tree tower will give your cat the perfect slice of paradise

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
